extracted_playbook.title: Update RTU500 Scripting Interface
extracted_playbook.description: Update RTU500 Scripting interface to Version 1.2.1 to mitigate vulnerabilities in earlier versions.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow Security Deployment Guideline
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the 'Remote Terminal Units Security Deployment Guideline' and apply mitigations as described in the Mitigation Factors/Workarounds Section.

extracted_playbook.title: Physically Protect Network
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure the network is physically protected from direct access by unauthorized personnel.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Firewall
extracted_playbook.description: Separate the network from other networks by means of a firewall system that has a minimal number of ports exposed.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Internet Usage
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure process control systems are not used for Internet surfing, instant messaging, or receiving e-mails.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Portable Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Carefully scan portable computers and removable storage media for viruses before they are connected to a control system.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement CISA Recommended Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets as detailed in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

cve_id: Improper Certificate Validation in Hitachi Energy's RTU500 series Product
